segments.text: Every honored guests , welcome to Hang Thou . Now we are visiting Tiger-running Spring .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How can we relate tiger to this spot , Miss Zhang ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Its name originates from a legend that two tigers run here and made a hole , and then a spring gushed out from it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The Longing Tea and the Tiger-running Spring water are always considered as the “ Two Wonders in West Lake . ”
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know that tea . It smells fragrant .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's right . All my guests , attention please . We will have half an hour to visit the spring and take photos . And next spot will be the Moon Reflected in Three Pools .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Janice , David , come here . We take some photos here . I can't imagine how beautiful it is !
segments.speaker: S2
